title: Elegantly furnished luxury House For Sale
details:
elegantly furnished luxury four bedroom house in a prestigious, gated housing development at Eden Gardens, Samagi Mawatha, Thalawathugoda.
Extent of Land – 15 pe
Extent of bare land – 7 pe
Floor area – 3000 Sqft
Bedrooms – 04
Bathrooms – 04
Width Roadway – 30 foot
Parking Space – 02
Built Year – 2008

Ground floor
One Bedroom, Common bathroom, Living, Dinning, Pantry, Kitchen, Servant room with Toilets, 02 Verandahs.

First Floor
03 Bedrooms With Master Bedroom, 03 Attached Bathrooms, Living room, Balconies.

Amenities – Gym, Swimming pool, 24 hour Security , 05 Air Conditioners, Three Phase Electricity, Centralized Overhead water tank, Standby Generator, Hot Water( Geezers/Solar power), Telephone, ), 05 TV points, Double Garage(Open), Fully tiled floor, Tile roof, regular maintenance and garbage disposal service, residents only leisure centre with tennis, squash and badminton courts, The house is elegantly furnished with high quality bespoke solid Mahogany furniture and the entire house is fitted with imported light fittings, luxury designer curtains and a burglar alarm.

Price: Rs. 48,000,000 ( inclusive of furniture, imported kitchen appliances, light fittings and designer curtains)
